name: product
notes: Setup your products and manage orders, including status tracking and invoicing.

name: financial
notes: Manage all your financials, including tax and payroll (Australia) reporting.

name: action
notes: Manage actions & activity with your space.

name: admin
notes: Platform administration.

name: contact
notes: Manage contact data for businesses and people eg customers, suppliers, partners.

name: core
notes: Core system functions.

name: document
notes: Manage your private, internal and public documents and folders.

name: event
notes: Manage an event, including attendee management.

name: logon
notes: Used to authenticate ie logon to mydigitalstructure.cloud.

name: messaging
notes: Manage conversions (posts/comments), email and send SMSs.

name: news
notes: Create news articles to send to contacts with tracking.

name: opportunity
notes: Manage you new sales opportunities, including tracking.

name: project
notes: Manage your projects and tasks.

name: register
notes: System functions for registering spaces and self-registering users.

name: setup
notes: Use to set up (configure) the space - eg action types, financial accounts, users.

name: site
notes: Functions to work with a website (private or public) - ie get list of products to show in an ecommerce website.

name: support
notes: Manage support issues - as a user of mydigitalstructure.cloud or to manage your own "help desk".

name: network
notes: Network functions to allow you to connect to other mydigitalstructure.cloud spaces.

name: structure
notes: Functions to add fields to existing organisational structures (object) ie Contact Person and also to create your own structures (objects).

name: attach
notes: Attach files and URLs to organisational data (objects).
